title: Normal curve equal central tendency Big Five

content.question: In a distribution of data comparing scores on the Big Five personality test, the mean, mode, and median of the distribution were the same. Which of the following best describes what the graph of this data would look like?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
